display_help: Use this power to give you a pop-up window which will explain your role as the Hitter. This power will remain with you throughout the Heist. Recharge: Very Fast
display_target_help: Use this power to give you a pop-up window which will explain your role as the Hitter. This power will remain with you throughout the Heist.
display_confirm: As the Hitter in the Heist of Tyrant's Palace, your first duty involves disabling the generators that provide power to the Vault's security defense matrix. This will provide easier access for the Thief when they attempt their infiltration. During your escape, your team must not be recognized by the casino's facial recognition software, so your second duty involves finding a random person to teach how to count cards in blackjack in order to trick the software into trying to identify them, not your team. The quality of your choice will determine how long the system is occupied by the process, giving your team a small reprieve.
